details.purpose: For the capture and reporting of patient-reported limitations and difficulties relating to Achilles tendon injury (ATRS = Achilles Tendon Total Rupture Score).
details.use:
Use to record patient-reported limitations and difficulties relating to injured Achilles tendon.
While openEHR archetypes are all freely available under an open license, the specific content of this archetype may be copyright protected. Any use of this archetype within implementations must be in compliance with the terms established by the copyright owners where a copyright exists.
details.misuse: Not to be used unless the terms of copyright have been observed (if a copyright exists).

items.items: ATRS
Achilles Tendon Total Rupture Score (ATRS).
Event Series
@ internal @
Point in time
A specific date and/or time which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
Tree
@ internal @
Tree
@ internal @
Extension
Additional information required to capture local context or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
e.g. Local hospital departmental infomation or additional metadata to align with HL7 or CDISC equivalents.
Tree
@ internal @
Confounding factors
Record any issues or factors that may impact on the overall assessment or score.
Limitation due to decreased strength
Assessment of degree of limitation due to decreased strength in calf or Achilles tendon or foot.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited due to decreased strength in the calf/Achilles tendon/foot? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Limitation due to fatigue
Assessment of degree of limitation due to fatigue in calf or Achilles tendon or foot.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited due to fatigue in the calf/Achilles tendon/foot? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Limitation due to stiffness
Assessment of degree of limitation due to stiffness in calf or Achilles tendon or foot.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited due to stiffness in the calf/Achilles tendon/foot? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Limitation due to pain
Assessment of degree of limitation due to pain in calf or Achilles tendon or foot.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited due to pain in the calf/Achilles tendon/foot? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Limitation during activities of daily living
Assessment of degree of limitation during activities of daily living.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited during activities of daily living? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Limitation walking on uneven surfaces
Assessment of degree of limitation when walking on uneven surfaces.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited when walking on uneven surfaces? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Limitation walking quickly up stairs or hill
Assessment of degree of limitation when walking quickly up the stairs or up a hill.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited when walking quickly up the stairs or up a hill? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitation.
Limitation running
Assessment of degree of limitation during activities that include running.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited during activities that include running? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitation.
Limitation jumping
Assessment of degree of limitation during activities that include jumping.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited during activities that include jumping? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Limitation performing hard physical labour
Assessment of degree of limitation performing hard physical labour.
Questionnaire wording: Are you limited in performing hard physical labour? 0=Major limitation, 10=No limitations.
Total score
Total score from all individual scores.
